interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: NeoCell Overnighter Collagen, 9.3oz Review Date: 2021/05/13 Store: NeoCell Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Brand': 'NeoCell', 'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Active Ingredients': 'Vitamin c,zinc', 'Unit Count': '9.3 Ounce', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '5.55 x 5.08 x 3.46 inches; 9.3 Ounces', 'UPC': '016185130623'} Review Text: The NeoCell overnighter collagen comes with about 20 servings in a $34.95 bottle, or about $1.75 per serving or day. The blueberry pomegranate flavor is not really perceivable as such; the flavor is sweet and artificial.

Collagen is supposed to moisture the skin and make it more elastic. However, intake of collagen in food form until recently was thought to be ineffective. This product does actually seem to firm, hydrate and restore my wife's skin. It has gaba and melatonin, so my wife tries to not take it prior to 20 minutes before bed. After starting this product, she's been having to get up during the night to use the restroom, because this is to be taken with 8 ounces of water. She would prefer to have this product in pill form, and to not have it include melatonin, which can help one fall asleep sooner, but may disrupt one's sleep cycle. So this product did not work well for my wife. Review Title: Melatonin and Water May Disrupt Sleep Cycle; Seems to Firm and Hydrate Skin Rating: 3.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
BeautyBio GloPRO Regeneration Tools {'Product Dimensions': '9.88 x 2.38 x 7.88 inches; 1.3 Pounds', 'Item model number': 'ZumYu', 'Batteries': '2 AAA batteries required. (included)', 'UPC': '810813030237 851262002673', 'Manufacturer': 'BeautyBio', 'Country of Origin': 'China'} At first, I was excited to get this micro-needling device, but then I started to look into micro needling. Dermatologists said to take Vitamin C 2 for weeks before use, and avoid sunlight; avoid makeup; your skin may peel afterward. So, I was afraid to try it out. It turns out, that using this is not painful at all. But when used on my forehead, it looks like it has more pores. So, I decided to start taking vitamins, and planned out when to try this out, but I avoided trying it out before times when I planned to expose it to sunlight, along with one week before my (wife’s) period.

Finally, I had the right time to try it out, and it had no obvious side effects...no pain, no skin flushing, no damage, no problems with sunlight or wearing makeup. Because this is a device made for home use, it is much more mild than professional devices. You may be able to use this every other day.

The device is light weight, and rechargeable, but comes with batteries, so you don’t have to charge before use; this makes it easy to bring on travel. I wish I had tried it much earlier.

The head is supposed to be replaced every three months at a current cost of $35. You are supposed to use a new cleaning pad before every use, and it came with 5 pads; the replacement skin prep pads are $35 for 30 pads which will last you two months, using it two to three times a week, which is what the manufacturer recommends. The minimum monthly cost of supplies is about $38 per month. You also need to have isopropyl (rubbing) alcohol to use with the provided spray bottle to sanitize the micro-needling head.

I would recommend using sun screen after use, to protect your skin.

After the first few uses, I haven’t seen much effect, but my husband thinks my face’s skin looks better. Don’t Be Afraid, Just Give it a Try! Bioré J-Beauty Makeup Removing Moisturizing Cleansing Jelly, Top Japanese Makeup Remover, Gentle Skin Cleanser, Mild Floral Fragrance, Non-Greasy, 7.8 Ounce Bioré ['Bioré J-Beauty Makeup Removing Moisturizing Cleansing Jelly is a non-greasy makeup remover that removes dirt and impurities from deep below the surface of your skin. This top Japanese makeup remover glides on gently and leaves no sticky residue. Formulated with conditioning beauty essence, this jelly leaves skin feeling moisturized and free of makeup. Satisfaction Guaranteed. Limitations may apply.'] {'Product Dimensions': '1.56 x 2.5 x 7.25 inches; 10.08 Ounces', 'Item model number': '28077_obs', 'UPC': '019100264557', 'Manufacturer': 'Kao USA Inc.'} Biore Cleansing oil make-up removing clothes come in a plastic box of 44 and are made in Japan. At first, my wife thought that these are small and thin, but she found that one was sufficient to remove makeup and mascara, with mascara top coat (which can be challenging to remove with other wipes). My wife has tried several brands before, including top-rated wipes, and all of them except for this one irritates her skin slightly. These do not! Her skin is pretty tough, and she doesn't usually have reactions to cosmetics.

There is a label on the inner package with Japanese writing, that's not translated into English on the package. It says to make sure to use the plastic box to store the wipes to ensure quality and peel off the sticker completely; don't remove the wipes from the bag; make sure to close the lid after use. I'd suggest that the manufacturer add a translated version on the package. The package says to use the entire package within 45 days after opening, so if you don't wear make-up every day, you may not finish the package before they start to dry out.

My wife loves these! Highly recommended, especially for those who have sensitive skin! Effective Wipes (with just one) - Recommended for those with Sensitive Skin! Small Spray Bottle,Plastic Spray Bottle for Hair 3.4 oz Empty Travel Spray Bottle [ 5 PACK] ARCTIC EAGLE {'Brand': 'ARCTIC EAGLE', 'Material': 'Plastic', 'Capacity': '3.4 Ounces', 'Product Care Instructions': 'Hand Wash Only', 'Reusability': 'Reusable', 'Package Dimensions': '8.3 x 5.7 x 1.7 inches; 3.99 Ounces', 'UPC': '791523481260'} This set of 5 spray bottles comes with caps, a spare pump, and a very tiny funnel for filling. The pumps work well, and create a very fine mist, that sprays about 10 inches from the nozzle. The bottles are fairly rigid. Overall, these are a great value! The funnel could be a bit larger, as it's top opening is not much larger than the neck of the bottles. Recommended! Good Quality, Fine Mist, Spare Pump and Funnel minihope Women's Elastic Hair Tiea, Black, 120 Count (Pack of 1), 4MM for Medium Hair.Value pack. minihope {'Material': 'Metal', 'Item Form': 'elastic', 'Brand': 'minihope', 'Hair Type': 'Medium, Thick', 'Number of Pieces': '120', 'Package Dimensions': '6.3 x 2.9 x 2.2 inches; 7.2 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'ET-SET-200703', 'UPC': '725683672763 661757097431'} For years, I have purchased random brands of elastic hair ties whenever I need more, and they have all performed similarly. I assumed that the Minihope Women's Hair Elastic Thick Ties would be just like the rest. Not so much. When I stretched one of them for the first time, they felt stiff and brittle, unlike all of the other elastic hair ties I have used. These stretch to about twice the original size when pulled, while my others stretch to about three times or more than the original size.

Stretching a new Minihope Hair Elastic Thick Tie just three times, it did not return to the original size. I’m guessing these won’t last long, even though they are more expensive than the ties I usually buy. Stiff, Little Stretch, Lack Elasticity Travel Bottles Keychain, 1.7oz/50ml Portable Hand Sanitizer Bottles, Fine Mist Spray Keychain Bottles, Empty Leakproof Refillable Containers with Flip/Spray Cap Plastic Travel Bottles (5PC) XITENBAO {'Brand': 'XITENBAO', 'Material': 'Silicone,Plastic', 'Capacity': '50 Milliliters, 1.7 Ounces', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Special Feature': 'Portable, Mist Spray, Leakproof', 'Package Dimensions': '7 x 7 x 2.5 inches; 3.99 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'klp-001', 'UPC': '192408404112'} I have been using hand sanitizer bottles with built-in carabiners and sprayer bottles for rubbing alcohol, but had never looked for a spray bottle with built-in carabiners... It is great that the sprayer bottles can be attached to something, as there is less chance of dropping and losing them while travelling. Note that since the sprayer cap isn’t attached and can be still lost.

This bottle can be used for gel / cream or liquid to spray. The sprayer tube extends to the bottom of the bottle near the narrow carabiner attachment hole, so you can spray until almost the last drop. The sprayer has been working well. It is also nice that the set includes a collapsible funnel for refilling. Love them! Great versatile little keychain bottles! Spray Bottle with Black Trigger, Suream 10.6oz/300ml Adjustable Sprayer with Stream Mist Mode for Hair, Refillable Empty Plastic Houseplant Mister for Hair Styling, Gardening, Ironing and Cleaning SUREAM {'Brand': 'SUREAM', 'Material': 'Plastic', 'Capacity': '10.6 Ounces', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Special Feature': 'Mist Spray', 'Package Dimensions': '11.81 x 4.92 x 3.27 inches; 3.21 Ounces', 'UPC': '704078929859'} I like this sprayer as it works very well and is the perfect size for hair products as it isn’t too heavy when full. The wide base makes the bottle less likely to tip over when placed quickly on a table or vanity. The opaque, dark gray color of this bottle protects light-sensitive liquids from light degradation. It sprays well. Highly recommended! Opaque Silver-Gray Sprayer with Great Form and Function NeoCell Overnighter Collagen, 9.3oz NeoCell {'Brand': 'NeoCell', 'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Active Ingredients': 'Vitamin c,zinc', 'Unit Count': '9.3 Ounce', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '5.55 x 5.08 x 3.46 inches; 9.3 Ounces', 'UPC': '016185130623'} The NeoCell overnighter collagen comes with about 20 servings in a $34.95 bottle, or about $1.75 per serving or day. The blueberry pomegranate flavor is not really perceivable as such; the flavor is sweet and artificial.

Collagen is supposed to moisture the skin and make it more elastic. However, intake of collagen in food form until recently was thought to be ineffective. This product does actually seem to firm, hydrate and restore my wife's skin. It has gaba and melatonin, so my wife tries to not take it prior to 20 minutes before bed. After starting this product, she's been having to get up during the night to use the restroom, because this is to be taken with 8 ounces of water. She would prefer to have this product in pill form, and to not have it include melatonin, which can help one fall asleep sooner, but may disrupt one's sleep cycle. So this product did not work well for my wife. Melatonin and Water May Disrupt Sleep Cycle; Seems to Firm and Hydrate Skin
profile:
The user continues to embody a cautious yet open-minded approach to skincare and beauty treatments, emphasizing informed decision-making and thorough research. Their recent focus on innovative products that enhance usability during travel is evident in their continued interest in high-quality, practical solutions that fit seamlessly into their routine.

Despite their analytical mindset and commitment to product quality, the user recently encountered a mixed experience with a new skincare supplement. While they observed positive effects on skin hydration and elasticity, they also noted potential downsides, such as disrupted sleep due to certain ingredients. This highlights their critical evaluation of product efficacy and the importance of formulation in their purchasing decisions.

The user maintains a priority for advanced skincare tools and non-invasive options, with a keen focus on safety, effectiveness, and minimal side effects, given their sensitivity to skin reactions. They consistently seek smart storage solutions, product maintenance, and cost-effective options without sacrificing quality, often relying on family feedback for informed choices.

Overall, the user's behavior reflects a passionate exploration of beauty innovations, with an emphasis on balancing functionality and safety, particularly for sensitive skin. Their latest experiences have reinforced their commitment to scrutinizing products deeply, ensuring that new treatments align with their standards for efficacy and usability while contributing to their overarching goal of achieving healthy, radiant skin.
